question: Which state government has recently decided to renamed Child Care Institutes as Jagannath Ashrams?
explanation: The Haryana government has recently decided to renamed Child Care Institutes as Jagannath Ashrams. This was announced by the Chief Minister Manohar Lal Khattar  while addressing the people during a dance competition organised by women wing of All India Vaish Federation (AIVF)  in Karnal on December 25, 2018.
